stories.text:
- Every time you feel the urge to check your phone, don’t do it immediately.

- Count to 10 so that your higher self is engaged. Now ask yourself “do I need this to achieve my goals?” The answer can be yes or no, of course.

- You don’t have to avoid using the phone completely. You can answer yes at times if it’s justified. Just be able to intervene between the phone and your intuitive addictive self, and make a conscious decision.
stories.title: How I’m successfully overcoming smartphone addiction

stories.text:
Just created this app, it lets you create fake chat and then download video of the entire chat in mp4 format.

You control both sides in conversation. I personally needed something like this but couldn't find anything on the web that can generate video of the conversation.

Before I push it to production, I would like to hear some feedback from you, is this something you would want to use?

I will attach link to resulting demo video here for anyone interested. http://chattlr.com/demo.mp4
stories.title: Create fake chat conversation and download it as a video
